Package util

Class AppointmentQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.AppointmentQuery
  • public class AppointmentQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the SQL queries select/insert/update/delete for Appointment Records It also contains additional methods to query foreign key data in customers, contacts, and users Sort By methods are used to repopulate the Appointments TableView by month/week from current date

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AppointmentQuery()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void delete​(int appointmentID)
      Uses Appointment ID to identify and delete Appointment Data from the database and allAppointments ObservableList
      static void filterByMonth()
      Uses curdate to populate allAppointments based on current month value
      static void filterByWeek()
      Uses curdate to populate allAppointments based on 7 day interval from current date/time
      static Customer getCustomerData​(int customerID)
      Selects all entries in client_schedule.customers to populate the Customer ID ComboBox with Customer IDs
      static Users getUserData​(int userID)
      Selects all entries in client_schedule.users to populate the User ID ComboBox

      Adds Appointment data from the Add Appointment Page into the database and allAppointments ObservableList
      static int queryAppointmentID​(int customerID, java.time.LocalDateTime start)
      Looks up the Appointment ID using the Customer ID - used in CreateUpdateAppointment Variables chosen with the assumption that a customer cannot be at two different appointments at the same time
      static java.lang.String queryContactName​(int contactID)
      Looks up the Contact Name using the Contact ID - used in CreateUpdateAppointment

      Selects all entries in client_schedule.appointments and populates allAppointments ObservableList

      • insert

        public static void insert​(java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          java.lang.String location,
                          java.lang.String type,
                          java.sql.Timestamp start,
                          java.sql.Timestamp end,
                          int customerID,
                          int userID,
                          int contactID)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds Appointment data from the Add Appointment Page into the database and allAppointments ObservableList
        Parameters:
        title - Title of Appointment
        description - Appointment description
        location - Location
        type - Appointment Type
        start - Start Time and Date
        end - End Time and Date
        customerID - CustomerID associated with appointment
        userID - UserID associated with appointment
        contactID - ContactID/Contact associated with appointment
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception

      • update

        public static void update​(int appointmentID,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          java.lang.String location,

                          java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd,
                          int customerID,
                          int userID,
                          int contactID)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Uses Appointment ID to update Appointment data from the Update Appointment Page into the database and allAppointments ObservableList
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - Appointment ID
        title - Appointment Title
        description - Description
        location - Location
        type - Appointment Type
        appointmentStart - Start Date and Time
        appointmentEnd - End Date and Time
        customerID - Customer ID associated with Appointment
        userID - User ID associated with Appointment
        contactID - Contact ID/Contact associated with Appointment
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception

      • queryAppointmentID

        public static int queryAppointmentID​(int customerID,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime start)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the Appointment ID using the Customer ID - used in CreateUpdateAppointment Variables chosen with the assumption that a customer cannot be at two different appointments at the same time
        Parameters:
        customerID - CustomerID
        start - Start Date/Time
        Returns:
        The Appointment ID to look up the Appointment object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception

      • queryContactName

        public static java.lang.String queryContactName​(int contactID)
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the Contact Name using the Contact ID - used in CreateUpdateAppointment
        Parameters:
        contactID - Contact ID
        Returns:
        The Contact name to get the contact objects
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception
